reviewer_info: Posted by Shahid Mehmood on Feb 20, 2016
review_text: The car is beautiful combo of eye catching extravegence and heavenly comfort. It cruises bullishly in the horizon and gains uncountalbe admirers where ever it's wheel leaves a mark. It's European engine is so powerful that it could run restlessly for days.
